Paul Newman was a very humble man, a real regular guy and proud to be a regular guy.... it was just like talking to you, a regular conversation, said michael lanigan, co-owner of Paul Newman/Carl Haas/lanigan racing in lincolnshire, in a telephone interview saturday, a day after Paul Newman died of cancer at age 83. "what we have now is the 720-hour program," said rich beeson, political director for the republican national committee, which is coordinating get-out-the-vote efforts for John McCain 's campaign. it's a two-week program, and in some cases, it's a month. Barack Obama 's campaign is targeting potential early voters state by state.
